A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I really enjoyed it. It was a fun Star Wars adventure featuring most of the OT cast. There are some really strange moments that made my eyes roll\, but what I liked far out weighed what I disliked. There is one thing I really did not enjoy\, and that's this stupid sub-plot about Finn and Rose that really didn't need to be in the movie. I don't want to get to in depth into the movie because I'm not a pro-reviewer or something\, but I enjoyed it. I really do not see why so many people dislike it SOOOOO much.
